entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 10:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to light snow or ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
